name: Divided Derby
description:
A race car was suddenly divided, but the race is still on!  Acting quickly the driver uses magnets to keep the the cars together, but not too close!  The further they are separated, the more difficult they are to control. Race against the clock and achieve the fastest time in Divided Derby!

For 1 to 2 Players

Created for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam

Created by:

Alex Twyman

Alexander Scaini

Daniel Jones

Enrique Mengual
